page.title: 15New Industry - Gyprok
page.content:
The three largest factories in the area have already been mentioned - see pages 12 to 14.
However, many smaller factories have come to the land between{Preston Brook and{Dutton. }These are sited on several small 'estates'
One of the less welcome has been the {Gyprok}factory making{fibre-glass.}It has a tall chimney which people find ugly.
In addition the factory is thought by some to be a cause of a recent rash of {sore throats. }This is, of course, pure speculation and no firm evidence has been forthcoming so far.
